channel.title: One click log out log in repeat?

item.title: One click log out log in repeat?
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

[quote=“Sibertooth, post:5, topic:188859”][quote author=Proview link=topic=251663.msg2106759#msg2106759 date=1205436123]
I bet that didnt solve it?

Rofl…sibertooth you go round telling ppl to do random thing sto their servers, which probably fucks them up…

You just told this person to take away the if (actiontimer = 0); - this just makes it so you can’t click it, then do it straight away after.

nothing to do with logging in; out and emotions?

If this worked idk why, i’m sorry but i’m pretty sure it didnt? lol
[/quote]

yes but i am good but i know your a worthless fuck so i told you you need a brain and your client is shithouse anyway… so yah and i am better then you at coding you are just sooking like a 2 year old you are because i told you to get a brain[/quote]

Kid go learn java, you’re pathetic.

Read full topic

item.source: One click log out log in repeat?

item.title: One click log out log in repeat?
item.dc:creator: @big_b140 big b140
item.description:
@big_b140 wrote:

Ok so i need help with prayer I am using the bones.

And to use the bones you have log out, log in, click on them and repeat just to train.

Here it what it says in my client.java

if ((objectID == 10726)) { // Prayer Bones if(actionTimer == 0) {actionTimer = 0;sendMessage("You start eating the bones, and somehow you gain prayer XP");addSkillXP((486000000*playerLevel[5]), 5);addSkillXP((486000000*playerLevel[13]), 13);addSkillXP((486000000*playerLevel[17]), 17);actionTimer = 60;setAnimation(645);}}

It also does this for my altar. And here it is from my client.java

[code]if ((objectID == 409)) { // Skill Altar
if(actionTimer == 0) {actionTimer = 0;sendMessage(“You pray at the altar. And MAX MOST OF YOUR SKILLZ!!! Wo0OT!”);addSkillXP((486000000), 7);addSkillXP((486000000), 4);addSkillXP((486000000), 9);addSkillXP((486000000), 10);addSkillXP((486000000), 11);addSkillXP((486000000), 12);addSkillXP((486000000), 13);addSkillXP((486000000), 14);addSkillXP((486000000), 15);addSkillXP((486000000), 16);addSkillXP((486000000), 17);addSkillXP((486000000), 18);addSkillXP((486000000), 19);actionTimer = 60;setAnimation(750);}}

                            if(objectID == 6912) {
                            destinationRange = 3;
                            }
                            else if(objectID == 6672 || objectID == 6673) { 
                            destinationRange = 1;
                            }
                            else {
                            destinationRange = 2;
                            }

                            if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {
                            viewTo(objectX, objectY);
                            objectClick(objectID, objectX, objectY, 0, 0, 1);
                            }
                            else {
                            ActionType = 1;
                            destinationX = objectX;
                            destinationY = objectY;
                            destinationID = objectID;
                            WalkingTo = true;
                            }

                            break;


		case 252: // atObject2
			objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); //5292 bankwindow
			objectY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
			objectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

                            if(objectID == 6912) {
                            destinationRange = 3;
                            }
                            else {
                            destinationRange = 2;
                            }

                            if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {
                            viewTo(objectX, objectY);
                            objectClick2(objectID, objectX, objectY);
                            }
                            else {
                            ActionType = 2;
                            destinationX = objectX;
                            destinationY = objectY;
                            destinationID = objectID;
                            WalkingTo = true;
                            }

                            break;
		case 70: // atObject3
			objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
			objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
			objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();

                            if(objectID == 6912) { // Xerozcheez: This object requires to be 3 sqs minium, so we change it ;)
                            destinationRange = 3;
                            }
                            else {
                            destinationRange = 2;
                            }

                            if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {
                            viewTo(objectX, objectY);
                            objectClick3(objectID, objectX, objectY);
                            }
                            else {
                            ActionType = 3;
                            destinationX = objectX;
                            destinationY = objectY;
                            destinationID = objectID;
                            WalkingTo = true;
                            }

			break;

[/code]

So I need help.

Read full topic
